channel.title: One whonix-GATEWAY for workstation and other OS
channel.description: Hello, i have two whonix-gateway for one whonix-workstation and other for other OS To switch between the workstation and the other OS's I always unplug the gateway one OS the OS and then turn on the gateway of another OS and the OS I have a question, is it possible to have sufficient security to do restart Tor in the gateway when saved and closed os of it gateway and start other operating system whether this option is safe?

item.title: One whonix-GATEWAY for workstation and other OS
item.dc:creator: Patrick
